Package org.activebpel.rt.axis.bpel.handlers

Handlers translate between messages and protocol formats such as JAX-RPC or SOAP Document.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
IAePolicyHandler Interface for Policy driven handlers acting as pivots.
 

Class Summary
AeAttachmentUtil Attachment utilities for common attachment related functions
AeBpelDocumentHandler The BPEL handler for web services under an Axis framework for document/literal style binding.
AeBpelHandler The base BPEL handler for web services under an Axis framework.
AeBpelRPCHandler The BPEL handler for web services under an Axis framework for RPC style binding.
AeBpelRPCLiteralHandler RPC Literal version of the RPC handler.
AeHTTPSender This class uses Jakarta Commons's HttpClient to call a SOAP server.
AeQSWSDLHandler Custom version of Query String Handler for serving up WSDL needed to work around issue in current Axis implementation.
AeRestoreClassLoaderHandler This class restores the original classloader which was replaced with the services context classloader by org.activebpel.rt.tomcat.AeSetClassLoader.
AeSetClassLoaderHandler This class loads the correct context classloader for the target service so we can locate service resource effectivly.
AeSimpleAuthenticationHandler A slight change on Axis's authentication handler.
AeSimpleAuthorizationHandler A slight change on Axis's authorization handler that checks to see if the user is authorized to hit the service.
AeWsaHeaderHandler Axis handler that flags all WS-Addressing headers as understood
AeWsdlReference Holds information obtained from wsdl def for the service desc object.
AeXPathHandler Abstract Base Class with utility methods for mapping SOAP Headers into process variable properties
AeXPathReceiveHandler Maps SOAP Headers into process variable properties
 

Package org.activebpel.rt.axis.bpel.handlers Description

Handlers translate between messages and protocol formats such as JAX-RPC or SOAP Document.
